title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Perform a comprehensive analysis to gather and document the detailed requirements for the quantum encryption system. This includes identifying relevant security standards (such as NIST PQC, FIPS 140-3), establishing performance targets (latency, throughput, key size), assessing integration needs with existing military communication networks, understanding user needs (ease of use, compatibility with existing devices), and addressing any other relevant requirements. Additionally, perform a SWOT analysis, risk assessment, and consider potential future-proofing against quantum computing attacks. Document all findings in a clear and concise manner for further development. This task may require input from multiple roles such as 'security-specialist', 'frontend-developer', 'backend-developer', 'database-specialist', 'devops-engineer', 'qa-tester'. Once completed, the findings will be reviewed by 'task-decomposer' and the project manager before moving forward. If necessary, input from a 'technical-writer' may also be required to help refine the documentation. Currently assigned to 'code-architect'.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the quantum encryption system, including components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Develop Quantum Key Distribution Protocol
description: Implement the quantum key distribution protocol for secure key exchange between parties.

title: Implement Encryption/Decryption Algorithms
description: Develop the encryption and decryption algorithms using the quantum-secure keys.

title: Design Secure User Interface and Communication Protocols
description: Design a secure and user-friendly interface for message exchange, along with robust communication protocols to ensure end-to-end encryption and integrity of transmitted data. The design should incorporate security principles such as least privilege access, strong authentication mechanisms, tamper-evident features, key management strategies considering future quantum computing attacks, and post-quantum cryptography. Additionally, the design should provide clear instructions for setup and usage, with intuitive error handling and troubleshooting guidance, detailed documentation, and user testing to validate usability and security. The design should also consider accessibility standards for different users.

title: Develop Security Auditing and Monitoring
description: Implement security auditing and monitoring mechanisms to detect and respond to potential threats or attacks.

title: Set up Testing and Validation Environment
description: Establish a testing and validation environment for the quantum encryption system, including simulated attacks and performance benchmarking.

title: Develop Deployment and Integration Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan for deploying and integrating the quantum encryption system with existing military communication infrastructure. The plan should cover the following key aspects: 1) Infrastructure requirements (hardware, software, network) 2) Integration points and interfaces with legacy systems 3) Deployment strategy (phased rollout, pilot testing, post-deployment monitoring and adjustments, including timelines and milestones) 4) Security and access control measures (including encryption keys management, secure communication channels, user authentication, and data protection strategies such as zero-knowledge proofs and quantum key distribution) 5) Monitoring and maintenance processes (including system health checks, incident response, regular security audits, and performance metrics) 6) Training and documentation for personnel (including training modules, user guides, and technical documentation) 7) Rollback and contingency plans 8) Collaboration with other teams (such as DevOps, Security, and QA) to ensure seamless integration and operation. Additionally, consider the potential impact on system performance and usability during the deployment process. It would be beneficial to include a section on how to handle any unexpected issues that may arise during deployment. Also, consider the possibility of parallel development and testing with the design system architecture team. Lastly, add more details about the expected outcomes and benefits of this plan.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, components, and usage instructions for the quantum encryption system.
